text: The Bristol Virginia-Tennessee Slogan Sign is a landmark in the twin cities of Bristol, Virginia and Bristol, Tennessee, United States. The sign is positioned over State Street, a roadway along the border separating the two states. Although the landmark is technically located in both Tennessee and Virginia, the National Register considers the location as Tennessee. Category:National Register of Historic Places Category:Geography of Virginia Category:Geography of Tennessee
title: Bristol Virginia-Tennessee Slogan Sign
